lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors took the NBA by storm with their willingness to shoot 3-pointers from anywhere, at any time. They won a title, played for another and changed the way teams think about the 3.

headline.print_headline: College Basketball Teams Taking More 3-Pointers Than Ever
headline.main: College Basketball Teams Taking More 3-Pointers Than Ever
